article_title: Man Dies, Three Hurt In I-90 Crash
article_text:
Minneahaha County, SD

A serious crash on I-90 near the South Dakota/Minnesota border killed one man and hurt three others Saturday afternoon.

The driver of a pickup truck pulling a camper and motorcycle trailer lost control headed east, two miles west of Minnesota.

The truck entered the median and rolled. The driver was ejected.

Both eastbound lanes on the Interstate were shut down as crews dealt with a rollover crash.

Traffic was diverted off of exit 410.

Names aren't being released until the family is notified.
